thread.title: Musk's attorney urges OpenAI auction: sources

author: Minh Le
title: Musk's attorney urges OpenAI auction: sources
text:
Elon Muskâ€™s attorney, Marc Toberoff, has urged attorneys general in California and Delaware to push OpenAI to auction off a significant stake in the company, according to sources familiar with the matter.
This request aims to assess the fair value of OpenAIâ€™s charitable assets as the company restructures to separate its for-profit business and non-profit operations.
Toberoff emphasized the need for competitive bidding to protect the publicâ€™s interest in OpenAIâ€™s charitable assets.
This request follows OpenAIâ€™s move to form a public benefit corporation to support fundraising efforts.
A court decision on Muskâ€™s request for a preliminary injunction is expected later this month.
